reference_summary:
Hippie Honey Scrub Exfoliant Facial Cleanser by Hippie Skin
Hippie Skin
['A gentle, invigorating cleanser that sloughs away dead skin, fights bacteria, and leaves skin soft and vibrant. Formulated with essential oils that support aging skin, this cleanser is a must have for a natural daily routine! SCENT: Lavender and honey, yum! INGREDIENT SUPERSTARS: Raw Honey - antioxidant, antibacterial and antiinflammatory properties support reduced scarring and promote skin regeneration. The natural sugar crystallization and glycolic acid contained in raw honey gently sloughs away dead skin cells, promoting cleaner, healthier skin. Lavender Essential Oil: Promotes skin healing, reduces redness and promotes blood circulation, which provides more oxygen and nutrients to the skin. Carrot Seed Essential Oil: Promotes skin health through antiseptic properties. Tightens pores and skin to combat sagging skin and fine lines. DIRECTIONS: Massage onto face with upward circular motions and rinse well with warm water. Recommended for all skin types.']
{'Brand': 'Hippie Skin', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Dry, Normal', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 2.68 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '865233000117', 'Manufacturer': 'Hippie Skin'}
The scrub has a creamy texture and smell strongly of honey.  It applies easily to the skin, and rinses off without effort.  My skin feels soft after use, and it has helped with my break-outs
It applies easily to the skin
Argan Oil Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Sulfate Free All Natural Hair Repair Treatment, Clarifying Volumizing & Moisturizing, Color Safe, Gentle for Curly & Color Treated Hair Gift Set (2x 8oz)
Premium Nature
{'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Premium Nature', 'Hair Type': 'Curly,Damaged,All,Straight,Color Treated', 'Special Ingredients': 'Vitamin-e,Jojoba-oil,Almond-oil,Peach,Argan-oil,Camellia-oil'}
I have been using this shampoo and conditioner set only briefly. Nevertheless, it smells pleasant, it didn't leave my hair tangled, or oily. It left my hair with a lot of body, and very soft. Of course, time will tell as to how my hair hold up in the long run. For the time being however… I am very  pleased.
So far I am very satisfied.
Smooth Lavender Sugar Scrub
Lime and Lotus Organics
{'Brand': 'Lime and Lotus Organics', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Information': 'Jar', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 2.75 x 1.75 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '712038258284'}
I'll admit when I first received this scrub I was disappointed.  It was a small container, and I thought it would be gone within a week.  It has been three weeks, and I barely made a dent!  The scent is lovely, the scrub is luxurious, and most importantly... it works!  My skin is smooth and blemish-free.  That is quite the achievement!
A surprise

{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Bali Secrets', 'Scent': 'Lemongrass', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 1.97 x 6.89 inches; 9.91 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BALI-SOAP-LEMO'}
This is my first time trying this product.  I like the scent which is gently reminiscent of lemongrass.  The pump is a wonderful feature.  This does clean well.  It also doesn't leave scum in the tub.  That makes me happy.  I certainly don't want to break my neck first thing in the morning.
worth trying
Hair Food Kiwi & Mission Fig Volume Shampoo and Volume Conditioner Set
Hair Food
{'Product Benefits': 'Oil Free', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Hair Food', 'Scent': 'Kiwi', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '9.45 x 7.28 x 5.98 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '037000822141'}
I used this shampoo and conditioner this morning, and so far I am very happy.  My hair feels light, and clean.  I didn't discover any tangles, or frizz. The scent is perhaps a little too sweet for my taste, but I cannot argue with results!I absolutely love the pump for each bottle.  It is so much cleaner, and controlled.
So far, so very good

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** The user continues to prefer natural skincare and haircare products with gentle formulations aimed at versatile usage. They seek high-quality products that effectively enhance hair vitality, as highlighted by their recent positive experience with a weightless moisture shampoo and conditioner set.

- **Scent Preferences:** They enjoy calming, delicate scents and appreciate lighter fragrances, with a specific fondness for fresh notes. While they value subtle freshness, they remain cautious of overly sweet scents that may not align with their taste.

- **Skin and Hair Types:** The user focuses on products suited for sensitive skin and hair, actively seeking solutions that promote overall health and vitality while emphasizing lightness and manageability. They particularly enjoy products that leave their hair feeling soft and bouncy.

- **Texture Preferences:** They favor creamy and luxurious textures, particularly those that offer effective detangling and ease of use, enhancing their experience of managing frizz and tangles.

- **Usage Focus:** The user prioritizes functional products that deliver transformational results, underscoring the importance of effective cleansing and moisturizing benefits.

- **Review Tendencies:** They provide insightful reviews emphasizing sensory experiences and practical benefits, often highlighting user-friendly features and tangible outcomes in their feedback.

- **Natural Ingredients:** The user remains committed to natural and organic formulations across their personal care routines, reinforcing their dedication to effective holistic care solutions.

Overall, the user prioritizes high-quality, sensorial experiences while valuing performance, health benefits, and effective cleansing in their skincare and haircare routines.
